video_prompt: City lights subtly shimmer on water, reflections ebb and flow. Distant bridge lights slowly illuminate. Subtle atmospheric haze drifts across the skyline, catching the glow from countless changing building lights. Boats with glowing outlines drift  along the waterway.
image_prompt: Vertical panoramic night cityscape split by water, creating a mirrored illusion of two identical cities. Reflective water bisects the image, blurring streaks of light. Left city is bright with warm and cool building lights, a distant illuminated bridge, and glowing boats. Right city mirrors the left, depicted as actual land and buildings. Dark sky with faint illuminated clouds. Ethereal, symmetrical, long-exposure effect.
refined_video_prompt: City lights shimmer and ripple across the water's surface, reflections continually shifting. Distant bridge lights slowly bloom into illumination. Atmospheric haze gently drifts across the skyline, catching and diffusing the dynamic glow from countless building lights that subtly change and pulse. Boats with glowing outlines subtly move along the waterway.
